dataIdInfo.idPurp: A map matching tool based on a Hidden Markov Model
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool allows map matching (matching of track points to a network) in arcpy using a Hidden Markov model with probabilities parameterized based on spatial + network distances. It outputs a file "NameofInputTrack_pth.shp" inside the current workspace, which contains a path of network segments to which the track was mapped.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Follows the ideas in Newson, Krumm (2009): "Hidden markov Map Matching through noise and sparseness"
